page.shortlink: api desktop api waitdialog class set percent function
page.description: The .SET_PERCENT() method sets the position of the progress bar when the progress bar has been created with style "percent".
page.syntax: Set_Percent as C(count as N,total_count as N)

argument.name: count
argument.description: The current value, shown as a percentage of the Maximum_Value.

argument.name: total_count
argument.description: The maximum value, equivalent to the right end of the progress bar.
